sentences.sContent: At a time when sprawling shelves of ice are disintegrating, this berg seemed to signify more.
sentences.sContent_eng: At a time when sprawling shelves of ice are disintegrating, this berg seemed to signify more.
sentences.sCn: 当伸展的冰架正在瓦解的时侯，这座冰山的出现更显得意味深长。

sentences.sContent: While a Polar bear sleeping on an ice berg with its paws clutched around it like a toddler holding their teddy bear is truly cute.
sentences.sContent_eng: While a Polar bear sleeping on an ice berg with its paws clutched around it like a toddler holding their teddy bear is truly cute.
sentences.sCn: 当北极熊在冰山上睡觉时，爪子抓住周围，就像一个蹒跚学步的婴儿抓着他们的泰迪熊一样，那是真的非常可爱！
